languages.text: {n}Проктор наклоняется к вашему уху и тихо произносит:{/n} "Поверьте моему опыту, к нам под благовидным предлогом приставили соглядатая, но так даже лучше — сделаем из шпионки свой источник информации о мире. Пока стоит подыграть губернатору и основательно расспросить девчонку, когда рядом не будет лишних ушей".

{n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор наклоняется к вашему уху и тихо произносит:{/n} "Поверьте моему опыту, к нам под благовидным предлогом приставили соглядатая, но так даже лучше — сделаем из шпионки свой источник информации о мире. Пока стоит подыграть губернатору и основательно расспросить девчонку, когда рядом не будет лишних ушей".

traits.locale_text: {n}The proctor leans closer and whispers in your ear:{/n} "From my experience, we have been assigned a spy under a favorable pretense, but this is fine. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we find ourselves away from prying ears."

{n}The proctor leans closer and whispers in your ear:{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

{n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich zu dir und erklärt mit gedämpfter Stimme:{/n} "Meiner Erfahrung nach wurde uns unter dem Vorwand der Großzügigkeit eine Spionin untergejubelt, aber das ist gut. Diese junge Frau wird uns wertvolle Informationen über diese Welt liefern. Wir sollten fürs Erste mitspielen und sie intensiv befragen, sobald uns niemand mehr belauschen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich zu dir und erklärt mit gedämpfter Stimme:{/n} "Meiner Erfahrung nach wurde uns unter dem Vorwand der Großzügigkeit eine Spionin untergejubelt, aber das ist gut. Diese junge Frau wird uns wertvolle Informationen über diese Welt liefern. Wir sollten fürs Erste mitspielen und sie intensiv befragen, sobald uns niemand mehr belauschen kann."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se penche vers vous et dit à voix basse :{/n} « D'après mon expérience, je dirais que l'on nous a affecté une espionne maquillée en généreuse attention, mais ce n'est pas une mauvaise chose. Cette jeune femme nous servira de source d'informations sur ce monde. Je vous recommande de jouer le jeu pour le moment, puis de l'interroger quand nous serons à l'abri des oreilles indiscrètes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se penche vers vous et dit à voix basse :{/n} « D'après mon expérience, je dirais que l'on nous a affecté une espionne maquillée en généreuse attention, mais ce n'est pas une mauvaise chose. Cette jeune femme nous servira de source d'informations sur ce monde. Je vous recommande de jouer le jeu pour le moment, puis de l'interroger quand nous serons à l'abri des oreilles indiscrètes. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙朝你靠了过来，压低声音，开了口。{/n}“根据我的经验来看，那个总督故作慷慨，把他的间谍派到了我们身边。不过，这不是什么坏事，我们可以利用那个年轻姑娘进一步了解这个世界。在这种情况下，我们最好继续配合他们演戏。等到没人窥探我们之后，我们就可以从那个姑娘嘴里得到所有想要的答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙朝你靠了过来，压低声音，开了口。{/n}“根据我的经验来看，那个总督故作慷慨，把他的间谍派到了我们身边。不过，这不是什么坏事，我们可以利用那个年轻姑娘进一步了解这个世界。在这种情况下，我们最好继续配合他们演戏。等到没人窥探我们之后，我们就可以从那个姑娘嘴里得到所有想要的答案。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se inclina hacia ti y, bajando la voz, comenta:{/n} «A juzgar por mi experiencia, nos han encasquetado una espía haciéndolo pasar por un gesto de amabilidad. Sin embargo, nos conviene. Haremos que la muchacha nos informe sobre este planeta. Por el momento, será mejor seguir su juego e interrogarla cuando no haya nadie escuchando».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se inclina hacia ti y, bajando la voz, comenta:{/n} «A juzgar por mi experiencia, nos han encasquetado una espía haciéndolo pasar por un gesto de amabilidad. Sin embargo, nos conviene. Haremos que la muchacha nos informe sobre este planeta. Por el momento, será mejor seguir su juego e interrogarla cuando no haya nadie escuchando».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンが近づいてきて、あなたの耳元でささやく。{/n}「私の経験からすると、寛大さを装ってスパイが送り込まれたようです。しかし、それはむしろ好都合です。この若い女性を、惑星の情報源として利用できます。今のところは、詮索好きな人の耳から離れてから、彼女にしっかりと質問するのが賢明だと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."

languages.text: {n}Yaklaşan Solomorne, alçak sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Deneyimlerime dayanarak söylüyorum... Cömertlik kisvesi altında peşimize casus taktılar. Bu iyi bir şey. Bu genç kadını kullanarak dünya hakkında bilgi edineceğiz. Şimdilik oyunlarına ayak uyduralım, meraklı kulaklardan uzaklaştığımızda onu iyice sorgulamak akıllıca olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans closer and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "Based on my experience, I would say we have been assigned a spy under a pretence of generosity, but this is a good thing. We will use this young woman as our source of information about the world. For now, it would be wise to play along and question her thoroughly once we are away from prying ears."
